answers.answer: Hi.  I'm not a medical professional, just the parent of a kid with diabetes.  I just don't have the knowledge or experience to help you, but I know a group who does.  JDRF's online support team has the resources to help you find what you are looking for.  Here's the way to contact them:http://www.jdrf.org/index.cfm?page_id=103451Good luck.
